cont.entity_a: Great sound quality with clear highs, mids, and lows. Sound quality is well-balanced and improves with foam mod. Sound quality is excellent, revealing details in music.
cont.entity_b: Sound is clear and good for interviews but not high fidelity. Requires an amp for full sound quality. Heavy and bulky design with muffled sound quality. Not suitable for music enthusiasts seeking high quality.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable fit, even for long periods.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable to wear but not as comfortable as Bose.

cont.entity_a: Good construction but prone to developing cracks over time. Durable over many years of use with some cosmetic issues.
cont.entity_b: Durability issues with plastic and wiring.

cont.entity_a: Open ear design allows sound leakage, not ideal for public or quiet environments.
cont.entity_b: Heavy and bulky design. Collapsible design for easy transport.

Cable.comm: Long cable, which can be both convenient and cumbersome.

cont.entity_a: Requires an adapter for 3.5mm jacks, which is included.
Bass is decent but not overpowering.
Great value for the price, especially with modifications.
Not suitable for noise isolation, but excellent for sound reproduction.
cont.entity_b: Good noise isolation but not complete. Good for blocking out external noise.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable even with extended use, though slightly heavy.
Customer service is responsive in case of issues.

cont.entity_b: Volume control on headphones is a useful feature. Volume control allows adjustment without device settings.
